rules_text: {12}: Trench Leviathan gets +5/+5 until end of turn. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each card type among cards in your graveyard.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
